calculations.name: Tenor CMF ToH
calculations.tableau_expression:
// Created to match the CMF TOH buckets - Antoine Des Aulniers Favreau 24-Mai-2017
// New edit to fix Term Date and match RLC buckets - ADF 11/1/2018

if year([RISK_DATE]) = 1980 and [BUCKET_MODE_IND]="PARALLEL" then "Parallel" else 


    IF [Risk Date # of Days]<=96 then "0-3M"
    else if [Risk Date # of Days]<=189 then "3-6M"
    else if [Risk Date # of Days]<=371 then "6M-1Y"
    else if [Risk Date # of Days]<=556 then "1-1.5Y"
    else if [Risk Date # of Days]<=1102 then "1.5-3Y"
    else if [Risk Date # of Days]<=1832 then "3-5Y"
    else if [Risk Date # of Days]>1832 then ">5Y"
     
else "Error"


END
end
END
END
END
END
END
END

calculation_context.Expression:
// Created to match the CMF TOH buckets - Antoine Des Aulniers Favreau 24-Mai-2017
// New edit to fix Term Date and match RLC buckets - ADF 11/1/2018

if year([RISK_DATE]) = 1980 and [BUCKET_MODE_IND]="PARALLEL" then "Parallel" else 


    IF [Risk Date # of Days]<=96 then "0-3M"
    else if [Risk Date # of Days]<=189 then "3-6M"
    else if [Risk Date # of Days]<=371 then "6M-1Y"
    else if [Risk Date # of Days]<=556 then "1-1.5Y"
    else if [Risk Date # of Days]<=1102 then "1.5-3Y"
    else if [Risk Date # of Days]<=1832 then "3-5Y"
    else if [Risk Date # of Days]>1832 then ">5Y"
     
else "Error"


END
end
END
END
END
END
END
END
